metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6307 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in tnef before 1.4.13. Two OOB Writes have been identified in src/mapi_attr.c:mapi_attr_read(). These might lead to invalid read and write operations, controlled by an attacker.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tnef - 1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1').
